main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[usp_GetPoolsNotInList]'') AND type in (N''P'', N''PC'')) DROP PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetPoolsNotInList] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE PROCEDURE [dbo].[usp_GetPoolsNotInList] @PoolList nvarchar(200) AS BEGIN SET NOCOUNT ON; DECLARE @Pools TABLE( DimPoolId bigint ) declare @Pos int declare @NextPos int declare @vchPoolId varchar(10)
If @PoolList is null or @PoolList = '''''''' Return 0
SET @NextPos = CHARINDEX('''','''', @PoolList, 0) If @NextPos = 0 begin Insert @Pools(DimPoolId) values (Convert(bigint, @PoolList)) End
SET @Pos = 0 WHILE (@NextPos > 0) BEGIN If @NextPos - @Pos > 0 and @NextPos - @Pos < 10 begin SET @vchPoolId = LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTRING(@PoolList, @Pos, @NextPos - @Pos))) insert @Pools(DimPoolId) values (CONVERT(bigint, @vchPoolId)) print @vchPoolId end SET @Pos = @NextPos + 1 SET @NextPos = CHARINDEX('''','''', @PoolList, @Pos) If @NextPos = 0 begin SET @vchPoolId = LTRIM(RTRIM(SUBSTRING(@PoolList, @Pos, LEN(@PoolList) - @Pos + 1))) insert @Pools(DimPoolId) values (CONVERT(bigint, @vchPoolId)) print @vchPoolId end END
select * from tblDimPool where DimPoolId not in (select DimPoolID from @Pools)
END '
SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; EXEC (@BigSQL)
